Newsletter

Our laboratory publishes the Information Technology Research Update: a free periodic newsletter providing summaries, analyses, insights, and commentaries on information technology research. The newsletter is distributed by email; contact us to subscribe. From this page you can access the archive of older issues as plain text messages.
